product_name: The North Face Roo II Waistpack - 2013 Closeout
long_description: This classic Roo II lumbar pack from The North Face is ideal for carrying your necessities on a short hike or an extended urban exploration. Main zippered compartment is roomy enough to hold your wallet, sunglasses, sunscreen and more. Front zippered pocket carries small essentials. Breathable foam back panel circulates air for cool comfort. The North Face Roo II features a carry handle and a fully adjustable hipbelt to fit waist/hips up to 46 in. Closeout.
short_description: This classic Roo II lumbar pack from The North Face is ideal for carrying your necessities on a short hike or an extended urban exploration.
